title: Mobile AR-based Malay Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Providing a Malay language learning environment combining the real world with virtual objects via AR technology. Blends face-to-face classes with self-directed learning via mobile apps.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use 20 Malay collective nouns in context-specific situations through an AR app.
Learners can understand 15 Malay proverbs within their cultural contexts and apply them in explanatory writing.
Learners can use 30 Malay conversational expressions with over 80% accuracy in real-life scenarios through AR-based interactive activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
